parameter.name: enableAddressLookup
parameter.label: Enable Address Lookups
parameter.description: Use OpenStreetMap to reverse lookup address from vehicle's Geo position

parameter.name: numRluHistory
parameter.label: Entries in Remote Lock/Unlock History
parameter.description: Number of entries to fetch from the action history (if supported for the vehicle model). Newest one will be first, for each entry a group is created (1..5). 0 means disable fetching this history

parameter.name: numShortTrip
parameter.label: Entries in Short Trip history
parameter.description: Number of entries to fetch from the short trip history (if supported for the vehicle model). Newest one will be first, for each entry a group is created (1..5). 0 means disable fetching this history

parameter.name: numLongTrip
parameter.label: Entries in Long Trip history
parameter.description: Number of entries to fetch from the long trip history (if supported for the vehicle model). Newest one will be first, for each entry a group is created (1..5). 0 means disable fetching this history

parameter.name: numDestinations
parameter.label: Entries in Destination History
parameter.description: Number of entries to fetch from the destination history (if supported for the vehicle model). Newest one will be first,for each entry a group is created (1..5). 0 means disable fetching this history.

parameter.name: numSpeedAlerts
parameter.label: Entries in Speed Alert History
parameter.description: Number of entries to fetch from the speed alert history (if supported for the vehicle model). Newest one will be first,for each entry a group is created (1..5). 0 means disable fetching this history.

parameter.name: numGeoFenceAlerts
parameter.label: Entries in Geo Fence Alert History
parameter.description: Number of entries to fetch from the geo fence alert history (if supported for the vehicle model). Newest one will be first,for each entry a group is created (1..5). 0 means disable fetching this history.
